body.content.pre: International Match Mexico v Panama Mexico: Talavera, M. Herrera, I. Jimenez, Torres Nilo, Rivas, Jonathan, Guemez, Esquivel, Aquino, R. Jimenez, Vela. Replacements: Munoz, Reyes, Layun, Corona, Moreno, H. Herrera, Peralta, Aguilar, E. Hernandez. Panama: Penedo, Machado, Godoy, Gomez, Parris, Quintero, Pimentel, Henriquez, Cooper, Baloy, Nurse. Replacements: Mejia, Miller, Macea, Addles, G. Torres, Tejada, Davis, Blackburn, Pinzon, Buitrago, Calderon.
